WorkItem.Description:
With the latest version of Rawr (v2,2,22), simply trying to open the program will cause to start to load up, but before it can fully load, it crashes with the age old error "Rawr has encountered a problem and needs to close.  We are sorry for the inconvenience." I've tried redownloading it twice, but to no avial.
Â 
Dell Inspiron 530
Intel Pentum Dual CPU E2160 1.80GHz
3.00 GB of RAM
Windows XP Home SP3
.NET framework is installed
WorkItem.Summary: Crash upon loading the program itself on Windows XP.

Comments.Message: I've tried repair and uninstalling and reinstalling .NET framework 3.5 and still having the same problems. Any other suggestions?
Check to see that you aren't blocking parts of the program from running with an Antivirus suite

I dont believe my antispy or antivirus is blocking it.. im using AVG free version virus protection and Defender Pro Antispy for spyware protection. neither have given me any problems in the past. If there is something i need to look at inside either program, please let me know.
Problem resolved. the file was being stored in temp internet files folder for some reason. It is now saved on the desktop and looks to be working fine. Thanks for the help!

Coming across a different 2.2.22 issue. When I close the program I cannot re-open it -- the error is that I have Rawr running already. Checking Task Manager's processes tab, there is a RAWR.EXE listed. It will not respond when I try to terminate the process.

In order to re-open Rawr 2.2.22, I have to reboot.
Sounds like an issue on your machine, Bloodfeud... I'd check for viruses.
